PackageOracle.name: DA_AGREEMENT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_AGREEMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.38.478667000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_agreement_id IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_nm IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_original_start_dt IN DATE
,agreement_plan_exception_dt IN DATE
,agreement_financial_exceptn_dt IN DATE
,agreement_sign_dt IN DATE
,agreement_legally_binding_ind IN NUMBER
,agreement_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_agreement_id IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_nm IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_original_start_dt IN DATE
,agreement_plan_exception_dt IN DATE
,agreement_financial_exceptn_dt IN DATE
,agreement_sign_dt IN DATE
,agreement_legally_binding_ind IN NUMBER
,agreement_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,agreement_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_agreement_id IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_nm IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_original_start_dt IN DATE
,agreement_plan_exception_dt IN DATE
,agreement_financial_exceptn_dt IN DATE
,agreement_sign_dt IN DATE
,agreement_legally_binding_ind IN NUMBER
,agreement_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,agreement_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_agreement;

body.name: DA_AGREEMENT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_AGREEMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.38.491573000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_agreement_id IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_nm IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_original_start_dt IN DATE
,agreement_plan_exception_dt IN DATE
,agreement_financial_exceptn_dt IN DATE
,agreement_sign_dt IN DATE
,agreement_legally_binding_ind IN NUMBER
,agreement_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_agreement.add(fx), parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || source_agreement_id || '|' || agreement_nm || '|' || agreement_original_start_dt || '|' || agreement_plan_exception_dt || '|' || agreement_financial_exceptn_dt || '|' || agreement_sign_dt || '|' || agreement_legally_binding_ind || '|' || agreement_type_cd || '|' || agreement_subtype_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_agreement a
(
a.agreement_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.source_agreement_id
,a.agreement_nm
,a.agreement_original_start_dt
,a.agreement_plan_exception_dt
,a.agreement_financial_exceptn_dt
,a.agreement_sign_dt
,a.agreement_legally_binding_ind
,a.agreement_type_cd
,a.agreement_subtype_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_agreement_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.source_agreement_id
,add.agreement_nm
,add.agreement_original_start_dt
,add.agreement_plan_exception_dt
,add.agreement_financial_exceptn_dt
,add.agreement_sign_dt
,add.agreement_legally_binding_ind
,add.agreement_type_cd
,add.agreement_subtype_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.agreement_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_agreement.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_agreement_id IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_nm IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_original_start_dt IN DATE
,agreement_plan_exception_dt IN DATE
,agreement_financial_exceptn_dt IN DATE
,agreement_sign_dt IN DATE
,agreement_legally_binding_ind IN NUMBER
,agreement_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_agreement.add, parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || source_agreement_id || '|' || agreement_nm || '|' || agreement_original_start_dt || '|' || agreement_plan_exception_dt || '|' || agreement_financial_exceptn_dt || '|' || agreement_sign_dt || '|' || agreement_legally_binding_ind || '|' || agreement_type_cd || '|' || agreement_subtype_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_agreement a
(
a.agreement_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.source_agreement_id
,a.agreement_nm
,a.agreement_original_start_dt
,a.agreement_plan_exception_dt
,a.agreement_financial_exceptn_dt
,a.agreement_sign_dt
,a.agreement_legally_binding_ind
,a.agreement_type_cd
,a.agreement_subtype_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_agreement_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.source_agreement_id
,add.agreement_nm
,add.agreement_original_start_dt
,add.agreement_plan_exception_dt
,add.agreement_financial_exceptn_dt
,add.agreement_sign_dt
,add.agreement_legally_binding_ind
,add.agreement_type_cd
,add.agreement_subtype_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_agreement.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,agreement_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_agreement_id IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_nm IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_original_start_dt IN DATE
,agreement_plan_exception_dt IN DATE
,agreement_financial_exceptn_dt IN DATE
,agreement_sign_dt IN DATE
,agreement_legally_binding_ind IN NUMBER
,agreement_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,agreement_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_agreement.add, parms=' || agreement_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || source_agreement_id || '|' || agreement_nm || '|' || agreement_original_start_dt || '|' || agreement_plan_exception_dt || '|' || agreement_financial_exceptn_dt || '|' || agreement_sign_dt || '|' || agreement_legally_binding_ind || '|' || agreement_type_cd || '|' || agreement_subtype_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_agreement a
(
a.agreement_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.source_agreement_id
,a.agreement_nm
,a.agreement_original_start_dt
,a.agreement_plan_exception_dt
,a.agreement_financial_exceptn_dt
,a.agreement_sign_dt
,a.agreement_legally_binding_ind
,a.agreement_type_cd
,a.agreement_subtype_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.agreement_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.source_agreement_id
,add.agreement_nm
,add.agreement_original_start_dt
,add.agreement_plan_exception_dt
,add.agreement_financial_exceptn_dt
,add.agreement_sign_dt
,add.agreement_legally_binding_ind
,add.agreement_type_cd
,add.agreement_subtype_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_agreement.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,agreement_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_agreement.del, parms=' || agreement_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_agreement a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.agreement_id = del.agreement_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_agreement.del');

END del;

END da_agreement;
